column4: i hear linux is designed to be left on and not rebooted, is that still the case? is it bad to reboot?
great, thanks, also is it bad on hardware to leave the computer running?
i wouldn't worry about it. your computer will be obsolete before something wears out from continous running. Might want to keep an eye on your hard drive temperature though..
sounds good, my case is pretty well ventilated
